import React, {useState} from 'react' import Services from './Services' import OurCourses from './OurCourses' import CoursesSec from './CoursesSec'; import Development from './Development'; import Testimonial from './Testimonial'; import Blog from './Blog'; import Footer from './Footer'; import Newsletter from './Newsletter'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Contact from './Contact'; const Hero = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState([ { id : 1, userImg : "/images/user-1.png" }, { id : 2, userImg : "/images/user-2.png" }, { id : 3, userImg : "/images/user-3.png" }, { id : 4, userImg : "/images/user-4.png" } ]); return ( <>

) })}

San Diego , PA

Congratulations !

) } export default Hero
